iWant: to have an option to talk to a professional person after the chat, to discuss the advice or some level of double checking
soThat: I can challenge the advice from different sides
because: I know how valuable feedback from different sources can be (it comes from a caring perspective)
desirable: I have a button in the chat where I can instantly reach a professional person on career advice and only sharing parts of the conversation that I want
acceptable: same situation as desirable, but not instantly, but have the option to make appointment in the end of conversation
dealBreakers: there is no option / or person is not trained on giving useful career advice
comment: Support/Solidarity and Accessibility and Reliability all placed very close to each other

values.explanation: "just" outsourcing career advice to bot, leaves people alone
People might prefer face-to-face / not everyone might be comfortable with face-to-face talks
we want to rely on the competence of the person - if it lacks it, we have no fallback
